sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  div.hello
    h1 {{ msg }}
    form(@submit.prevent="addItem")
      input(type="text", v-model="newItem")
      input(type="submit")
    ul
      li(v-for="todo in todos")
        span {{ todo }}
        button(@submit="deleteItem(index)") 削除
    a
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'todo',
  // props: {
  //   msg: String
  // },
  data: () => {
    return {
      msg: "TodoList",
      newItem: '',
      todos: [
        'task1',
        'task2',
        'task3'
      ]
    }
  },
  methods: {
    addItem: function(){
      this.todos.push(this.newItem);
      this.newItem = ''
    },
    deleteItem: function(index){
      this.todos.splice()
    }
  }
}
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
h3 {
  margin: 40px 0 0;
}
ul {
  list-style-type: none;
  padding: 0;
}
li {
  display: inline-block;
  margin: 0 10px;
}
a {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
